evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek a declaratory judgment that their terminations were unlawful and an injunction against official action to effectuate their removal from office.

Plaintiffs’ central claim in this litigation is that Defendants acted ultra vires and in violation of the CPSA by removing them as CPSC Commissioners without cause and taking action to effectuate the purported terminations.
